about.title: About - Tennis Universel
about.description: Tennis Universel is a community of tennis enthusiasts. Discover our mission to make the yellow ball accessible to all of humanity.
about.label: About
about.intro: We are a community of tennis enthusiasts. It all started with a WhatsApp discussion during COVID between friends and acquaintances. This sport makes us "go crazy" as Gilles Simon would say. Welcome everyone to Tennis Universel. This website aims to make the yellow ball accessible to all of humanity.

team.title: A passionate team
team.description: We are an original team made up of individuals with diverse roots. This is not surprising, because deep down, the "Yellow Ball" is universal, isn't it?

social.title: A social media
social.description: Tennis Universel shares a societal vision. No matter where we come from, the important thing is to exchange about this magnificent sport that is very often a victim of clichés and limiting thoughts. Feel free to share your stories and anecdotes about the "Yellow Ball".

beyond.title: Beyond borders
beyond.description: Tennis Universel aims to go beyond the borders of tennis. Reaching out to people who have never encountered the yellow ball is a motivation. Building bridges with other sports and other areas of society, such as culture, environment or economics is also a desire. Let's break the codes together.
